Content:: Roger Rene Joseph Savoie (July 29, 1931 – August 17, 2009) was a defensive lineman who played fifteen seasons in the Canadian Football League for the Winnipeg Blue Bombers. In 2005 he was inducted into the Manitoba Sports Hall of Fame and Museum.  This biographical article relating to a Canadian football defensive lineman is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
